Title: Isis
Description: Isis is a control panel for ASP.NET applications that allows easy visibility into the application's assemblies (debug or not), logging, errors, cache, session, performance counters, and more.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Isis is a control panel for ASP.NET applications that allows easy visibility into the application's assemblies (debug or not), logging, errors, cache, session, performance counters, and more.

For updates on Twitter, follow @aspnetisis.

Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.

Install the latest version using NuGet Isis in NuGet Gallery:
Install-Package isis
